remarks: Equality theorem for sum, when the class expressions ` B ` and ` C ` are equal everywhere.  Proved using only Extensionality.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement: sumeq2w $p |- ( A. k B = C -> sum_ k e. A B = sum_ k e. A C ) $.
